เกมจะให้เราเลือกเป็นนักฆ่าหรือผู้รอดชีวิตก็ได้แต่ละตัวละครก็จะมีความสามารถต่างๆกันไปเราต้องใช้บลัดพอยส์ไปสู่สกิล
หรือไอเทมต่างๆในผังสกิลพวกไอเทมไฟฉายกล่องพยาบาลหรือofferingเป็นพวกใช้แล้วหมดไปจะมีแต่สกิลperkที่อยู่กับตัวละคร
นั้นไปตลอด  สกิลที่ได้หรือไอเทมที่ได้มาไม่สามารถนำไปใช้กับตัวอื่นได้ ดังนั้นควรตั้งใจเป็นตัวๆไปดีกว่า เพราะเกมนี้ไม่ได้แยก
ผู้เล่นเลเวลสูงกะเลเวลต่ำจากกัน  ไม่ต้องแปลกใจเลยว่าผู้รอดชีวิตเลเวลสูงจะหลบหนีผู้ล่าได้ง่ายมาก  และบางครั้งผู้ล่าก็ล่าผู้รอดชีวิต
จนหมดได้ง่ายๆ
-ขอติก็ตรงที่ไม่สามารถชวนเพื่อนจับกลุ่มกันไปให้นักล่ามาไล่ฆ่าได้  แต่เมือมองดีๆแล้วก็จะเข้าใจว่าถ้าผู้เล่นเป็นเพื่อนกันสื่อสารกันในทีมได้
ฝ่ายผู้ล่าจะเสียเปรียบทันที  แต่ระบบเกมก็ยังอำนวยให้เล่นกันในหมู่เพื่อนได้แบบprivate
-ด่านในฉากยังไม่หลากหลาย
-บางครั้งเกมก็จบลงแบบงงๆทั้งที่ยังมีผู้รอดชีวิตในเกมอยู่

Классная игра.

Dieses Spiel lässt einen erzittern und in panik verfallen. Für jeden der Aufregung und Herzrasen liebt, ist 

genau das, dass richtige Spiel! Teamplay und Logik ist in diesem Spiel unausweichlich.
Man kann sich zwischen Überlebenden und Killer entscheiden, wobei die jeweiligen Charaktere ihre eigenen 

Eigenschaften besitzen, welche über ein Blutnetz hochgelevelt werden.
Leider kann man aktuell nur mit Freunden in einem Privatgame spielen. Aber, es wird auch schon an dem Online 

Survivalmodus gearbeitet, damit wir auch zu zweit oder dritt gegen andere spielen können.

Ich kann dieses Spiel nur empfehlen, da es extrem viel Spass macht.
Wer sich unsicher ist, kann sich hier das Spiel nochmal genau anschauen.

♥ Killermodus # https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpSLz-r_xRo
♥ Survivalmodus # https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Lmoqx4F8hc

♥ LG Euly und Ela ♥

P.S Разработчики обещают пополнять контент новыми маньяками,картами и т.д,поэтому первый минус скорее из-за того,что игра совсем новая.
Советую к покупке!

I really want to like this game, check that I actually really do like this game. The night I purchased this I bought it along with four other friends and we played a few hours in a private group the issue came when one person left....We quickly realized that this game has no public match group support so you can solo q or well, you can solo q. If you dont happen to have a full group of five people then you arn't even able to private q so basically you are unable to play with friends. More over not only can you not play with friends you can't even play with the community. Basically there are no redeeming social aspects to the game and for that I give it a huge thumbs down. I have read that the dev is "working" on making group play a real thing but before that they want to make sure people who drop out of games early are punished better. I don't understand why this game even has a ranking system or trys to promote any kind of e sports functions. If it was a lets try to survive a psycho killer with your friends that had all the fun and screams that I enjoyed with a full group of people then it would be a home run. Sadly Starbreeze Studios really dropped the ball on this one. I would check back in on this to see if they fix the social issue because it is super fun just not alone.
能排一下午队，汉化还不能用，5分钟等待完，直接得分画面，垃圾

I do not reccomend this game. I will start with the most glareing reasons. I am sad to say this though because I love the concept and really tried to like the game.  

So to start off with we will do Cons since I don't reccomend the game:

First Glaringly unplayable due to lots of issues with glitches. I have about 10 friends who play this game of those 10 atleast 3 experince glitches that range from weird and annoying to game breaking. I have videos on my stream of the gamebreaking glitches happening lots of times while I am live. I can go into details but most glitches include character models tripping out or worse broken game client that doesn't work/crashes entirely kicking you from the match.

There is a little box that comes up saying when did this happen? I wrote in a few times but quickly gave up and waited a few weeks for a patch. Most might say (oh it's on your end something isn't installed properly but I have done all the appropriate things to make sure the game should have no issues. I have a brand new I5-6600K processor 16 gigs of ram a gtx 980ti etc. etc. You  get the point it was proffessionally built and less than 2 months old. No issues with any other game I play and verified intergritty of the files in steam. These glitches happen 1 out of 3 games and leave me relaunching with no points and a loss for the match. 

Outside of that matchmaking is REALLY REALLY BAD. By this I mean the times are huge considering  everyone is playing this game, the ranks are so spread out bottom ranks playing agasint top ranked players etc. one or the other would be meh fine. But I have an average of 3-5 minutes at least for queues and then I will have a rank or level that has atleast 10 times as much time in the game as I do. This coupled with the crashing make the game really hard to play in the first place.

Those are out of game issues or playability. So how is the game when it is running properyly? It is fun definitely fun. I'd probably change this to a reccomend but not a 10/10 OMG get this reccomendation. as it stands. The game has a fun concept solo tough guy vs 4 weak guys trying to escape. Think mario party but a bit more complicated.

With that being said it isn't super duper complicated. The concept is simple and easy enough to figure out after a match or two making the learning curve not too steep. However with perks and items there is enough to keep you invested for quite a while perfecting your master plans. I give it a 100 or 200 play hours before I would find myself bored or craving something new. However I can't do it with all the issues. With that being said 100 hours on a game that's only 20 bucks? totally worth it!!! I think this is a great game that should have had more polish and a cleaner launch. Worst launch ever?? No blizzard holds that record in my book. but blizzard also cleaned up a lot faster this is 2 or 3 weeks out and I still see people having issues no one can solve. 

All in all do you loovvvveee the concept and you're willing to take the risk? If so buy it. but if you're going to be frustrated by mechanics not being polished, random crashes, and horrible matchmaking? stay away!!
Лучшая в своем роде!!!!10 Join a Lobby из 10!!!

Сразу скажу, что "бомбануло" после патча.

Начнем с начала. 
Игра со старта много всего обещала, но вышла "сырой", как будто это бетка, не оптимизированной, с кучей багов, маньяками хостами (которые абузят пинг, чтобы у вас все лагало) и без обещанных карточек (2 недели прошло и решили таки добавить).

Ах да, забыл про читеров!! пару раз встречался с маньяками, которые телепортировались по генераторам, один раз маньяк был с явным ВХ, и КУЧА людей наигравших менее 10 часов, но уже с 50ым уровнем и несколькими престижами на выживших и маньяка со всеми вытекающими из этого бонусами. Их кстати, все еще не забанили, они, как играли, так и играют и вполне возможно,что в следующей игре они попадутся вам и вы сольете ранг.

Но это можно было терпеть, потому, что задумка игры просто офигенная, чтобы не тормозила игра, я даже поставил Low настройки и играл при 30 фпс, хотя имею конфигурацию компа на которой топ игры идут на высоких с 50+ фпс.

Шло время, я долго сидел на 20ом ранге, пока не начал играть за Мэг, с ее спринтом, который хоть как то уравнивал шансы побега. И вот тогда игра пошла, я набирался опыта, научился выживать и с переменным успехом я получал в 2 из 3 игр каплю и повышал свой ранг. 

И вот вышло обновление, испортившее перки, которое меньше всего затронуло тех, против кого оно и было выпущено! Пытались пофиксить опытных выживающих, которых единицы, а в итоге испортили игру всем остальным. Потому, что опытные и с этими ограничениями затащат, а вот новички и те, у кого уровень перка маленький, теперь вообще не могут играть и повышать ранг.
Если раньше ливали из игры единицы выживающих, то теперь, почти в каждой игре, кто нибудь да ливнет, что усложняет выживание остальных.

Конечно, зачем заниматься оптимизацией игры, фиксом багов и введением лобби с другом, если можно выпустить гавно - патч, который испортит игру!

DC (это кароче ливание) теперь наказывается только со стороны выживающих (хотя, повторюсь, после патча, ливеров стало толпы), ведь теперь, за это дают еще и очки маньяку.
Если же обиженка маньяк ливнет, после того, как вы открыли ворота, чтобы вы не получили 5000 за побег, то все нормально, разработчикам на это пофигу. Раньше еще и ранг забирали у выживающих, но хоть это пофиксили, спасибо.

Играть за маньяков теперь могут даже полные аутисты, потому, что убежать от них могут лишь единицы.

Хотелось бы вернутся к тому,что ХОСТ в игре, это маньяк. Так вот, особо умные маньяки, специально абузят пинг, заходя не в свой регион или нагружая свой интернет различными торрентами, чтобы у выживающих все жутко лагало. PROFIT, ведь у маньяка то не лагает.

Чуть не забыл, теперь, лобби формируется по рангу, и, если вы живете не в Москве с диким онлайном, то СИДИ ****** И ЖДИ 10 МИНУТ ПОКА НАЙДУТСЯ РАВНЫЕ ТЕБЕ ПО РАНГУ или играй с бешеным пингом не в своем регионе.

Если разработчики и дальше будут двигаться в таком направлении, то игре осталось пара месяцев.

Игра отвратительная! Баги на релизи думал, что исправяться патчами, но патчи с фиксами пришлось ждать 2 недели которые сделали игру ещё менее играбильной! Баг за багом в лоби не возможно собрать людей. Всё как всегда начали за здравия, а закончили за упокой. Будь возможность вернл бы игри ибо она уже через 2 недели скатилсь в не играбельное говницо.

Игра НЕ в раннем доступе, но при этом кривее многих "пре-альфа".

(Актуально для версии 1.0.2)
Просто отвратительный матч-мэйкинг (вас 1 лвл запросто ставят с соперником 50 лвл, и че хочешь то и делай). Поиск матчей за маньяка - может достигать 10 минут и безрезультатно. Бесконечные выходы выживших - просто нечто. 
В свою очередь, за выживших частно при попытке присоединиться - выбрасывает обратно в гл. меню без каких-либо объяснений.
Понятие "баланс" - отсутствует как таковой.

Игра ужасно оптимизирована при довольно посредственной(тем более для 4 анриала) графике, нет настроек чувствительности мыши (по умолчанию - замучаешься ее вертеть).

Периодически вылазит баг - маньяк при поднятии "уроненного" выжившего просто "зависает" с ним на плече. Лечится только выходом из матча.

В добавок, после патча 1.0.2 игра стала периодически зависать (можно назвать фризом, посколько зависание не фатальное - где-то через минуту отвисает).
my hands get sweaty when doing gens so i just play killer to get smoked by rank 12s after reaching rank 18 then get demoted to rank 19
Игра отличная но ещё нужно доработать

เอาเงินพี่ไปเลย สนุกแบบนี้
---------------------------------
4 ปีผ่านไป ปีนี้ปี 2020  ผมก็ยังคงแวะเวียนมาเล่นเกมนี้อยู่บ่อย ๆ ไม่คิดเหมือนกันว่าจะเล่นนานขนาดนี้ ชั่วโมงเล่นเยอะมาก ๆ เกมราคาไม่กี่ร้อยเมื่อ 4 ปี ที่แล้วเล่นขนาดนี้คุ้มราคามากครับ

The game is fun and once you figure out it could be addictive if they fix the problems. it feels more like a beta. A community of cheaters using cheapp trcks to level up fast, a matchmaking system that doesn't work (im not talking about levels im talking about failing to enter you into a lobby 4 out of 5 times,) and lack of co-op with friends (althought it has been anounced that they're laning to add that.) The game is quite buggy and glitchy, it's like an ubisoft yearly release but for all the problems with the game it is modrately fun and has tons of replay value if you hav the specs to run it, the patience to learn it, and the balls to play it. 6.5/10 Fixing any of the issues that they promised to fix would easily raise this score owever they patched it and matchmaking has somehow become worse

- TLDR; imbalanced game on life support via the jingle of new features every 4 months, with a bad community and arrogant developers
- Terrible matchmaking system based on hidden variables, new players will usually get matched with people who have played 1,000 hours
- Once content is introduced to the game it will be nerfed to the point of uselessness, and forgotten about by the devs
- The same tired gameplay loop since 2016, no new activities to mix things up, do gens/hooks survivors and thats it
- Development focus near entirely on pleasing survivor players, making them more more buffed, and keeping mechanics used to taunt/insult killers; whereas the killers ability to taunt survivors (dribbling/camping/tunnelling) is removed; game is not fun to play as killer
- Devs have barely concealed their contempt for their audience during interviews, sneering at questions and chiding players for asking when they plan to introduce content they have promised to add for more than half a decade; only started to make meaningful changes to neglected content when they started to lose players
- Game has a hateful culture, where death threats are commonly given for players that play efficiently within the games rules
- Massive time sink via the points system used to unlock abilities for survivors and killers.  Will literally take you years to earn enough points in order to play your characters with all the abilities they have access to.  This means that if you player a killer/survivor for years and decided to start a new one, it will take a long time to unlock their content.
- Public matches as survivor are highly penalised compared to Survive with Friends, in terms of coordination, planning and accomplishing in-game tasks.  This is due to the game having no means of compensating for players who arent communicating together via social media while playing.
游戏的想法很好，而且也在不断完善中
虽然没怎么玩，改回来
Good
游戏的可玩性还是很不错的，但是当遇见一群新手遇到一起的时候，会发生断线情况，这个问题很可怕！

Absolutely riddled with bugs. The game is a ton of fun...when it works.

If you can look past

being glitched within terrain.
certain actions causing  unexpected short distance enemy teleports
having people rage quit causing you to gain no rewards
nearly impossible to find games later in the day despite 9k players supposedly being online
and ohh so much more! Then by all means grab it. Other wise just wait til they release a patch making the game at least half decent.

EDIT: Do note that starbreeze studios the publisher supposedly responsible for the recent-ish "microtransaction" debacle is also publishing for this game as well. Wallets beware!

EDIT 2: Fast forward 2-3 years and the game is no longer riddled with technical bugs as it used to be however "Balancing" of the game has now become giving killers undaunted access to early match insta kills and one shot abilities.

In short. Dont expect to have much fun once you climb out of the low ranks and enter intermediate play.

Disclaimer: Not going to be pretty after my previous match but will be semi fair.

    Gonna be honest, previous match with the killer has shown me that people leaving right when they get caught or right before dying sucks ****. This game has so many amazing moments and in my opinion this game has one of the best "Chase" mechanics. Yet they repeatedly fall short due to the survivors ability to undermine all your efforts by "juking" you by using infinite loops that take advantage of the killers inability to get through objects at any speed faster than turtles doing it. At this point you are stuck in a strugle of the HARDEST game of stareing. You begin to wonder who is going to go which way. It doesn't matter even if you did. The outcome is always the same. Ends up wasting all of your time. The best part of this whole thing is... that when you finally catch them. they decide to deny you the honor of the kill. You surprisingly get a CONSOLATION prize at the end if enough people leave in stupid ways. Two left my previous game which probably stole 500 - 1750 (+ xp boosts) from me by the cowardice of the whole situation. I fairly caught you after you destroyed my psyche and you ******* leave??? 

TL:DR: The game is great (8/10 -- arbitrary), survivors are fun, Hella custimization, overall fun gameplay from both sides but falls short due to the balancing issues.

I liked this game, but there needs to have a voice chat option, because this game would be more fun if you could communicate with random strangers while in a public lobby and outside of any chat rooms like skype.
Great game, please revoke my ban?
With the coop online now... i can put Yes Buy it!!! REally worth the price!!!

Game is Overall very fun but is a bit buggy and has some broken mechanics however DEVS have been pretty good about getting things fixed so far and responding to community feedback when you play Dead By Daylight you experience only pure terror and excitement and adrenaline its a great game but can use sum work to polish 

Final Score: 8.5/10

ถือว่าเป็นเกมส์ที่ดีเกมส์นึงเลยนะครับ ถ้าเทียบกับราคาเท่านี้ที่ถือว่าไม่สูงจนเกินไป
ตัวเกมส์นั้นเวลาเราเล่นมันทำให้เราสัมผัสได้หลายอารมณ์มาก สนุก ตื่นเต้น หวาดเสียว
เล่นเป็นนักฆ่าก็สนุกที่ได้ไล่ฆ่า ไล่หาคน
เล่นเป็นคนหนีก็มีแอบลุ้น คนไหนใจไม่แข็งพอนี่ใจเต้นรัวๆเลยก็มี
เล่นแล้วมันทำให้เราได้รับรู้ความรู้สึกเหมือนกับตอนเราเล่นซ่อนแอบกันตอนเด็กๆเลย
ถึงแม้ว่าตอนนี้ตัวเกมส์อาจจะมีข้อเสียอยู่บ้างเรื่องการที่ไม่สามารถชวนเพื่อนไปด้วยกันได้ แต่อนาคตกันใกล้เราก็คงได้เล่นด้วยกันแล้วไม่นานเกินรอ
เรื่องความสมดุลเกมส์ก็อาจจะมีเหลื่อมๆกันบ้าง แต่ก็แค่นิดหน่อย

โดยรวมแล้วจัดว่าเป็นเกมส์ที่คุ้มกับราคา และควรหามาติดไว้ใน steam เอาไว้เล่นกับเพื่อนได้ครับ
**เพิ่มเติม - จากวันแรกที่ซื้อเกมส์นี้มา จนถึงวันล่าสุดที่เล่นก็ยังคงไม่เบื่อ และเป็นเกมส์ที่ใช้เวลาเล่นเยอะที่สุดในตอนนี้เลย แม้ว่าบัคจะเยอะก็ตาม แต่ความสนุกของเกมส์ยังไม่ลดลงเลยจริงๆ.

Previously I did not recomend this game, but that was back in 2015, practically at launch. It's been a few years since then, I've noticed changes in the game and the community, so I decided to redownload it and give it a try. And from my experience, I am pleasently surprised. I've noticed major changes done to the game that generaly improved it since my last time playing. I've taken some of the new characters for a spin, seen some of the new content added, and I gotta say, win or lose, it was a blast. It sucks that majority of the chapter expansions were paid dlc, but what can you do. All in all, I'm glad I got back into the game, and I'd happily recommend this game to anyone.

The game it self is very entertaining and fun. It will get your heart beating at some moments but i dont think the game is scary in my opinion. The graphics were adequate and with an R9 380 i got around 30-50fps on ultra settings. This game is different than other games and if you are up for a challenge I recommend buying it especially on the steam sale.

Edit 11/05/2020:

It's been a few years since my first review, and I have to say the game has changed drastically from the beginning and there's really nothing else like it at this point. I've been playing in nonstop and sure it has its balancing issues still but its fun with a ton of variety now. I'd highly recommend this game now in its current state.

Old Review (below):

The game itself is fun, I won't deny that. I'll probably still play it even though it is plagued with issues. This game pretty much feels like its in early access even though it's not marketed that way. Game breaking bugs are not a rare occurence and tend to happen multiple times within a few hours of playing. For example you could be halfway through the game but then all of a sudden usernames just start popping up as if more people are joining the game, but you can't join in the middle of a match so it just crashes to desktop because it doesn't know how to respond to that. I'd wait on this game to see if the developers can actually get it to just a functioning point. I'm not going to bring up the balance issues because there are plenty but its still fun when you can actually play.

My verdict would be to wait until the game is stable enough to not crash or have servers disconnect on a daily basis.

I bought this game to play with my friend only to find out that surprise...you can't. Supposedly there is a new mode coming out to remedy this but they've been saying that for awhile now. The game itself is fun, and has a ton of potential, it can be really tense and with the right team very interesting and competitive for both the killer and survivors.

Before someone says well you can create a lobby and play with friends now, its not the same. You have to have 5 people to create a full lobby and you don't level up or gain points or anything. Playing this with a friend or two is what really made me get this game and unfortunately, did not live up to my expectations, I haven't played it really since launch and by the time the new mode is added, summer will be almost over and all the good games will be here. So long $20.

(revised review after 3 years of playing) Super fun game!  They finally added the party system wooo, they finally fixed perks dissapearing and when my progress got wiped, the devs gave me 5mill bloodpoint. Blahblah, if you are considering getting this game, DO IT!!

Great potential, but still riddled with bugs. I have so far been bugged out on a hill as of today, the torch just doesnt work at all, or if it does its so difficult to use it's just not worth it. I have been in games where I cannot interact with any obstacles. There seems to be a serious issue in game with players leaving half way through the match. This is incredibly annoying if the killer leaves as you miss out on a lot of XP especially if you have a clean line of escaping, there should be a punishment toll thats put in place to also play with unreliable rage quit players. And not only that, but even after this long a core mechanic that should have been in place since the get go has not been implemented yet... the ability to join friends and join a lobby as a two or three or even four. You are left having to scout lobby after lobby to try and randomly bump into your mate to play in a match with them, which I can imagine is annoying for the rest in the lobby waiting. Also whilst trying to join it would often say 'Failed to join lobby' countless times, or bug out to go back to the waiting menu. These things need to be fixed, they are essential for the game to work smoothly. 

That being said, this game is great fun when it does work and it gives you a great adrenaline rush with the killer trying to find you/chase you. The addition of more characters both survivor and killer will always be welcome, likewise more maps, and even different game modes. This game has a lot of potential and it's a fair price as well, look forward to the fixes. Buy it if you have money to spare, but if you want to have a smooth experience, just download after a month or so, hopefully it's sorted by then...

Просто могу сказать, что игрушка веселая, местами страшная, интересная и захватывает с первых минут, что потом не можешь оторваться, за свою цену очень годная мультиплеерная игра. Рекомендую тем, кто любит поживать без всяких оружий и тому подобного, а так же любитель сам поохотиться на таких, она из лучших игр в жанре
2016年，如果没玩过这游戏，你亏大了~

Dead by Daylight is a very interesting game that is still in the working.  This game has many bugs and can seem to be unfair sometimes but eventually you will understand that is how the game goes.  With the 3 killers my favorite is the trapper which can put traps in most places.  I would suggest if you are very bad at quick time events and like this game then be a killer since everything a survivor can do has quick time events in it except moving around the map.  Even with the nerfs the survivors received they can still win.  If you like horror games that are eventful then I suggest this game.

Как я ждал летнюю распродажу..
Как я ждал что-то новенькое...
Как я сравнивал ожидание и реальность:
Ожидание: я буду играть за маньяка и медленно убивать своих беспомощных жертв, пытая их и раздирая в клочья..
Реальность: Карта 20 на 20 метров, где ничего не видно, я бегаю, мне никого не догнать, активно только две кнопки - это удар и способность - по большей части вторая бесполезная. Они побеждают.
Ожидание: Мы будем играть сообща, спасать друг друга, пытаясь вырваться из рук безжалостного маньяка!
Реальность: Подбежал к генератору, поделал его, отбежал, посидел 30 сек, снова поделал. Следующий.
В итоге вместо инноваций серая, скучная и маленькая игра за 400 рублей!

Lots of bugs but that is expected in new games, People are complaining about there being no party system but come on the game is 2 weeks out of beta they cant have everything. Great game tho

bueno por empezar el juego está muy bien, la típica escena de halloween  el acecino los 4 universitarios escapando dos mujer y dos hombres, la tensión constante a la hora de jugar como superviviente y las ansias de matar jugando como acecino. tiene bastantes cosas que hacen al juego entretenido ya que no es como los típicos juegos que el enemigo es controlado por la IA que en cierto punto se vuelve imposible, eso es lo bueno que si el enemigo es malo el juego es súper fácil y si el enemigo es bueno es complicado pero más divertido la verdad que lo recomiendo.
ahora lo negativo del juego, por empezar no hay modo cooperativo como dice cuando vas a la tienda el cooperativo que dice es pero en partidas privadas la idea es que si son 5 amigos si esta bien jugar partidas privadas pero si somos 2 o 3 amigos que hacemos es aburrido jugar privadas siendo tan pocos. Pero bueno como el juego aun esta en desarrollo calculo que habrá cambios y espero ese sea uno de los cambias. Otra cosa es al emparejar te encuentra con gente de nivel alto y cuando eres nuevo te cuesta mucho encontrar partida por que los de nivel mas alto se salen al instante ver que tienes nivel bajo.
En fin el juego es recomendable y leo bastante futuro
